label: G18
headline: City approves a $37,000 grant to investigate old sexual assault cases and create a new interview room for victims.

label: G15
headline: Council approves a public hearing to gather resident ideas on the city's trash problem.

label: G6
headline: Council accepts a $450,000 state grant for the Penn Avenue lighting project.

label: G4
headline: Proposal for six privately-funded bus shelters in Hazelwood sent to committee for review.

label: G5
headline: Council introduces legislation to increase paid sick leave hours for Pittsburgh employees.

label: G10
headline: City Council approves the Urban Redevelopment Authority’s decision to give up a city-owned property.

label: G3
headline: Resolution introduced to authorize a $40,000 contract for the City’s immigration legal services.

label: G9
headline: City to pay $72,500 for overdue 811 utility call debts.

label: G17
headline: City to transfer 14 properties to the Larimer Consensus Group in a lawsuit settlement.

label: G19
headline: A committee recommends a grant application for the Emerald View Trail following a discussion on improving public input for city projects.

label: G23
headline: City Council places a five-week hold on a $1.5 million contract with Auberle for shelter services.

label: G11
headline: Council approves the sale of two Hill District lots from the Urban Redevelopment Authority to the Land Bank.

label: G7
headline: Council approves an additional $115,170 for design work on Fort Pitt Park improvements.

label: G21
headline: A city committee recommends allowing residential parking permit signs in some non-residential areas.

label: G16
headline: Council committee recommends canceling a property sale and refunding the buyer's hand money.

label: G20
headline: Proposal for University of Pittsburgh to help with Oakland trash pickup delayed for one week.

label: G8
headline: City to pay nearly $53,000 for annual Pennsylvania Municipal League subscription.

label: G14
headline: City grants Duquesne Light and Pittsburgh Water a right-of-way for a utility project on public land.

label: G25
headline: Council recommends a sewage plan update for a new townhome development on the South Side.

label: G0
headline: Council introduces legislation to clarify rules for posting residential parking permit signs.

label: G1
headline: Legislation introduced to expand residential permit parking in the South Side Flats.

label: G26
headline: City to grant ALCOSAN easements for underground tunnels in exchange for $8,200.

label: G24
headline: Council committee recommends approval of a sewer plan for a new apartment building on McKee Place.

label: G22
headline: Council approves expanding the residential permit parking area in the South Side Flats.

label: G12
headline: City Council approves the sale of a URA-owned property on Island Avenue for $3,600.

label: G13
headline: City Council approves the sale of a URA-owned property on North Aiken Avenue to the Pittsburgh Land Bank.

label: G2
headline: Pittsburgh Land Bank to acquire city-owned property on Reifert Street.
